General.Name: Halwani Bros
General.Description: Halwani Bros. Co. Ltd. produces and distributes a range of food products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Arab Republic of Egypt, and internationally. It offers halawa, tahina, maamoul, processed meat, jam, dairy products, juices, cheese, breaded chicken, burgers, and packaged foods, as well as catering services. The company was founded in 1830 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Halwani Bros. Co. Ltd. is a subsidiary of Aseer Industrial Investment Co.
General.Address: Jeddah Industrial Area, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 21421
